Jean-Paul Rustom

Programmer

I have learned OOP, OOD, and studied data structures as well as algorithms runtime analysis. I am familiar with topics such as procedural, functional, object oriented programming, design patterns, dynammic programming, stacks, linked lists, binary trees, as well as the big O notation. I worked in languages like Javascript, C#, C++, Python, PHP...

Web Developer

I decided to learn web development during the COVID19 pandemic. I learned how HTML, CSS, and Javascript are correlated and are the three necessary languages to design a front end. I also got into backend, learned Node js, PHP, Firebase and MongoDb.

Game Developer

I always wanted to learn how games worked under the hood. Already familiar with C#, I learned the basics of the famous multi-platform Unity engine. I watched some tutorials and made some mini 2D games. Currently on a hiatus from my game dev journey, I have decided that I will learn game design and dive much deeper into the games industry.

Hey there ! I'm Jean-Paul Rustom from Zouk Mickeal, Lebanon. I am currently a computer science student whose main interests are web and game development. I enjoy creating and customizing things on my own, I find programming a great skill and asset to have. I have experience coding in C++, C#, Javascript, PHP, Python, Dart... I am currently studying at Notre Dame University, Zouk Mosbeh, and will graduate by this summer. I intend to continue my post graduate studies as a software engineer and continue my learning journey.
